snippet.title: Pedro's Adventures in Spanish [Learn Spanish with Video Games]
snippet.description:
Available now for Windows PC through STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1602930/Pedros_Adventures_in_Spanish_Learn_Spanish/

"Pedro's Adventures in Spanish" is the language learning game designed to immerse you in a Spanish speaking world. All characters, narration and interface is written and spoken in simple Spanish accompanied by graphics, animation and context so you can learn without the need for translation. Learn Spanish the fun way!

Follow us on Facebook for updates:
https://www.facebook.com/RocketBoyGames

learn spanish fast, learn spanish in 30 days, spanish games for beginners, spanish games for learning, Spanish video games, spanish lessons, spanish lessons near me 
#rocketboygames #pedrosadventuresspanish #learnspanish
